long_description:
Stan, here. And if you don’t already know, I have a really big sweet tooth. I love eating all of the delicious food in our hotel at Café Aurea but I always love exploring new spots around Nob Hill for great desserts.

 

Here are the best spots for dessert in Nob Hill:

 

Cookie Love– These natural, hand-make cookies are so delicious! You have to try their Dark Chocolate Mint Chip! Located at 1488 Pine Street, you can walk to this nearby spot or you can have them delivered to your Stanford Court hotel room via food delivery service Caviar.

 

 

Batter Bakery– The Batter Bakery kitchen + shop is located at 1517 Pine Street with two additional retail locations located in downtown San Francisco. Visit their farmer’s market stand at the Ferry Plaza Farmer’s Market, 8am-2pm every Saturday, or at the Stonestown Farmer’s Market, 9am-1pm every Sunday!

 

 

Loving Cup– This one-of-a-kind frozen yogurt shop is the perfect treat after exploring San Francisco. Located next to Nob Hill in the Russian Hill neighborhood on Polk Street, Loving Cup lets you pick your yogurt flavor and mix-ins to create the perfect custom frozen yogurt.

 

You don’t have to pick just one of these delicious spots while visiting San Francisco, try them all!
